about.title: About

contents.name: My History
contents.description: Hi, my name is Jugunu Singh, and I come from Kushinagar, Uttar Pradesh, India. I studied B.Tech in Information Technology (IT) at Hemwati Nandan Bahuguna Garhwal University. I began my web journey a few months ago through YouTube, where I started learning web development while simultaneously building my own website to enhance my skills.

contents.name: Current Endeavors
contents.description: I'm developing a platform that enables users to discover and purchase outfits from online retailers like Amazon, Myntra, and Flipkart. This site streamlines the process of finding complete ensembles, assisting busy individuals in exploring options that include complementary clothing and accessories, integrated with affiliate links.

contents.name: Future Plans
contents.description: My next objective is to refine my web development skills and explore new technologies. I aim to contribute to an innovative company where I will continue to learn, grow, and make a significant impact through hands-on experience.

contents.name: Aspirations
contents.description: I strive to become a highly proficient web developer, keeping pace with the latest trends. I envision being self-sufficient, productive, and professional. Through my work, I hope to make positive contributions to the tech industry and inspire others. Additionally, I plan to enhance my websiteâ€™s capabilities to tackle challenges in outfit pairing and styling.

resume.title: Resume
resume.description: Explore my experiences, rewards, and education, as well as my activeness

contents.name: Foozy
contents.description: During my internship at Foozy, I developed a real-time order management system, integrated a web push notification system, built a menu management system, and created an analytics dashboard. I also implemented Cloudinary CDN, automated stock resets, and tracked transactions, improving performance, efficiency, and user engagement across the platform.

contents.name: Hemwati Nandan Bahuguna Garhwal University
contents.description: Studied Information Technology at Hemwati Nandan Bahuguna Garhwal University, Uttarakhand.

contents.name: Academic Global High School
contents.description: Completed 11th and 12th grades at Academic Global High School, Gorakhpur, Kushmi Jungle.
